Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.util

Class Mongo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.util.Mongo
  • public class Mongo
extends java.lang.Object
    There is only one Mongo.

    Provide an easy way to access Mongo's methods in a sync pattern.

      • findOneAndUpdate

        @Suspendable
public <T extends MongoRecord> T findOneAndUpdate​(java.lang.String collection,
                                                  io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject query,
                                                  io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject update,
                                                  java.lang.Class<? extends T> returnClass)
        Find a single matching document in the specified collection and update it.

        This operation might change _id field of query parameter

        Parameters:
        collection - the collection
        query - the query used to match the document
        update - used to describe how the documents will be updated

      • bulkWrite

        @Suspendable
public io.vertx.ext.mongo.MongoClientBulkWriteResult bulkWrite​(java.lang.String collection,
                                                               java.util.List<io.vertx.ext.mongo.BulkOperation> operations)
        Execute a bulk operation. Can insert, update, replace, and/or delete multiple documents with one request.
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection
        operations - the operations to execute

      • bulkWriteWithOptions

        @Suspendable
public io.vertx.ext.mongo.MongoClientBulkWriteResult bulkWriteWithOptions​(java.lang.String collection,
                                                                          java.util.List<io.vertx.ext.mongo.BulkOperation> operations,
                                                                          io.vertx.ext.mongo.BulkWriteOptions bulkWriteOptions)
        Execute a bulk operation with the specified write options. Can insert, update, replace, and/or delete multiple documents with one request.
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection
        operations - the operations to execute
        bulkWriteOptions - the write options

        @Suspendable

        Executes a bulk insert operation.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection
        documents - The documents
        Returns:
        The result of the insert.

      • insertManyWithOptions

        @Suspendable
public io.vertx.ext.mongo.MongoClientBulkWriteResult insertManyWithOptions​(java.lang.String collection,
                                                                           java.util.List<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject> documents,
                                                                           io.vertx.ext.mongo.BulkWriteOptions options)
        Executes a bulk insert operation with options.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection
        documents - The documents
        options - The options for writing, specifically whether or not the insert has to be ordered.
        Returns:
        The result of the insert
